com.intel.icecp.core.security.crypto.signature

Interface SignatureScheme<S extends SecretKey,V extends PublicKey>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - Signing key type
    V - Verification key type
    All Superinterfaces:
    SecurityService<String>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsymmetricSignatureScheme, Sha1withDsaScheme, Sha1WithEcdsaScheme, Sha1withRsaScheme, Sha256withRsaScheme

    public interface SignatureScheme<S extends SecretKey,V extends PublicKey>
extends SecurityService<String>
    Interface for a generic signature scheme

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] sign(byte[] dataToSign, S key)
      Returns the signature of a given data, using a given algorithm and key.
      void verify(byte[] signature, byte[] data, V key)
      Verifies the signature, given a public key and the algorithm; throws and exception if not verified

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intel.icecp.core.security.SecurityService

        id

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        byte[] sign(byte[] dataToSign,
            S key)
     throws SignatureError
        Returns the signature of a given data, using a given algorithm and key.
        Parameters:
        dataToSign - Bytes to sign
        key - Key to use for signing
        Returns:
        The signature bytes
        Throws:
        SignatureError - In case of error during the signing process

      • verify

        void verify(byte[] signature,
            byte[] data,
            V key)
     throws SignatureError
        Verifies the signature, given a public key and the algorithm; throws and exception if not verified
        Parameters:
        signature - Signature bytes
        data - Data to use for signature verification
        key - Verification key
        Throws:
        SignatureError - In case of error in verifying the signature
